content.prompt: A distinguishing feature of the Old Regime in eighteenth-century France was the

choices.label: dominant influence of the Roman Catholic Church on the cultural life of the elites
growth of modern machine industry in manufacturing centers such as Lyon
inability of the monarchy to carry out reforms necessary for its survival
mass emigration to the colonies in the New World

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
